Operation 'getEverything' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Original summary is too generic and doesn't convey the search/filtering capability. Description lacks critical details about input parameters (keywords, filters, sorting, pagination) and output structure. AI agents need to understand what query parameters are available and what the response contains to determine if this operation matches their intent. Enhanced version clarifies the operation's comprehensive search nature and specifies key input/output details.

data.current_description: Search through millions of articles from over 150,000 large and small news sources and blogs
data.summary_suggestion: Search and filter news articles across all sources
data.description_suggestion: Search through millions of articles from over 150,000 news sources and blogs using keywords, date ranges, and filtering criteria. Supports advanced query parameters for sorting and pagination. Returns a paginated list of matching articles with metadata including title, description, URL, publication date, and source information. Useful for comprehensive news research and content discovery across the entire news database.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic and doesn't convey the search/filtering capability. AI agents need to understand what query parameters are available and what the response contains to determine if this operation matches their intent. Enhanced version clarifies the operation's comprehensive search nature and specifies key input/output details.

message: Operation 'getSources' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, unclear_purpose, poor_ai_interpretability. Original summary is too generic and doesn't clarify the relationship to top headlines. Description uses vague language ('convenience endpoint', 'keep track') that doesn't clearly convey the operation's purpose or output structure. AI agents need to understand what data is returned (source metadata fields) and when to use this operation (source discovery before headline queries). Enhanced version specifies the output schema details and clarifies the operation's role in the API workflow.

data.current_description: Returns the subset of news publishers that top headlines are available from. It's mainly a convenience endpoint that you can use to keep track of the publishers available on the API.
data.summary_suggestion: List available news sources for headlines
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the complete list of news publishers and sources available for the top headlines endpoint. Returns source metadata including source ID, name, description, URL, category, language, and country. Use this endpoint to discover available sources before querying top headlines, or to maintain an updated registry of publishers supported by the API. Supports optional filtering by category and language.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic and doesn't clarify the relationship to top headlines. Description uses vague language ('convenience endpoint', 'keep track') that doesn't clearly convey the operation's purpose or output structure. AI agents need to understand what data is returned (source metadata fields) and when to use this operation (source discovery before headline queries). Enhanced version specifies the output schema details and clarifies the operation's role in the API workflow.
